column4: I need with my palm tx. I am on feisty and I use gnome pilot. I have a craddle usb. The sync work when I use usb: in device but it freeze while the task are syncing. I tried it on debian and it was fine (it used dev/pilot). The task don'T freeze when I select only copy to pda. That'S it)
I need with my palm tx
Try asking on the forums, that isn't something i've had experience with.
